divs: Sighting Details Outside with girlfriend watching fireworks when I saw a bright orange light that didn't blink but it pulsated. It was so bright it just caught my eye. It went from south to north and flew low. Once I knew it wasn't a plane I told my girlfriend to look at it. We continued to watch it for another 30 or forty seconds, when it flashed and disappeared. I had enough time to grab my phone and record it but the quality of the lens doesn't allow it to be visible. I have never seen anything like this in my life. I got online right after last night but didn't want to sound like a freak. The video does have an exact time but its so dark that it didn't pick it up.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Blue Springs
There were no other sightings in Blue Springs on or around July 4th 2010
Summary: Orange ball flying low south to north appeared on fire then flashed and disappeared.
